website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, this option is difficult to beat if you are looking for a crystal vase for a budget-friendly price. It has a history of many more happy customers than complaints.
pros: Inexpensive, yet combines heft with beauty for a solid deal
Has etchings and curves that give it an elegant look
Available in 8-inch and 10-inch models,  both at surprisingly low price points
cons: Occasional flaws in the crystal have been found
Some customers report receiving the wrong size
others note damaged vases upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed. It seemed cloudy out the box but just needed to be washed.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Alston

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wash and shock resistant
customer_reviews.text: Both all sides and bottom of the vase is thickened design, compared with ordinary vase more thick and strong, with high quality lead-free crystal glass looks like a gentleman, elegant and stable. Large size. Crystal glass production, the vase is more glaring than general vase, particularly in reflecting light, the vase will be very bright. Not only for home decoration, restaurant decoration, flower shop decoration, office decoration, sharp corners, bubbles and wrinkles on the glass, safe and beautiful. Worth to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Huy Le

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I prefer the classic styles to the more modern. This vase is beautiful and at this price it can't be beat. It's perfect for what I was looking ... not too tall it makes a real statement on the dining room table. It's so stylish, beautiful and catches so much light. It's a show piece for sure. I am so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Bhavs

customer_reviews.title: It’s a nice vase
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize how small 8 inches was. It’s very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Crissydione

customer_reviews.title: Lovely vase
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Sits very pretty on my counter!
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Vase for small bouquet
customer_reviews.text: Nice crystal cut vase. This is a wonderful size. Big enough for a small bouquet of flowers. Thick sides make it sturdy. Beautiful design is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Crystal beautiful vase.
customer_reviews.text: Received item on time smooth and good shape, yes its worth of penny i can say of my own, Thick crystal glass and good looking vase. I love it now i can buy a new flowers to put on my vase
customer_reviews.author: Lley

customer_reviews.title: very durable heavy weighed vase.
customer_reviews.text: very durable heavy weighed vase. Greta value for the money. will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: 00 dollar flower vase that is dull and definitely does not shoot rays of light around ...
customer_reviews.text: this product did not meet the description stated on the website either that or I didn't get the so color box. right now I have a $2.00 dollar flower vase that is dull and definitely does not shoot rays of light around the room. i would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Leonard M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I mean for the price you can’t go wrong. I give it 5 stars because it’s exactly as described however it’s not too durable. It’s not that thick. It’s not that big or heavy. It worked out well for the bed room but for a heavier traffic area I see this thing falling and breaking into pieces. Good for the price but if your looking for a heavy durable one look elsewhere. If you want an inexpensive decent vase, well this is it
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted but pretty
customer_reviews.text: I only gave 3 stars because it's small not big enough for a whole dozen roses. We are stuck in the house & there isn't enough time for me to order another mother's day gift so I am stuck with this & not happy bout it! What I do like it's pretty and sturdy considering it was shipped on no special packaging & left on my porch so the fact that it wasn't broken still amazes me.
customer_reviews.author: Just Inga

customer_reviews.title: So lovely!
customer_reviews.text: This vase is kind of heavy, but that adds to the beauty and sturdiness. It's smooth and feels like waves of water swirling around my hand. I haven't gotten flowers yet. But I can't wait to set this up.
customer_reviews.author: Brendasphere

customer_reviews.title: this vase is good for light or medium size bouquet
customer_reviews.text: this vase is good for light or medium size bouquet . If you ave Bouquet with 25-50 roses, or lilies or long Calla lilies - this vase would be too small.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra Nataly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tea table.
customer_reviews.text: It is neither very big nor too small. Thick and strong. The size is perfect for tea table. I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Gagandeep Singh Chadha

customer_reviews.title: Medium size flower vase and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality flower vase with a medium size which I expect to be a bit bigger as well its expensive for the price. In the other way around I used it in my living room and just like a perfect fit with the tulip flower that I've ordered. But as I have said, I only give 3 stars as it's too expensive for the price of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Crobles2019

customer_reviews.title: Love this vase
customer_reviews.text: I feel in love with this vase on line and even more so after receiving it. It is much prettier than pictured. Very elegant, beautifully crafted, very sturdy. It is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: DHC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: The vase is a nice design but much smaller than anticipated and the glass itself arrived greasy. No bubble wrap around it either. Wouldn’t recommend, unless you have a very small bouquet and not using as a centerpiece.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the 8” and 12” sizes and I am thrilled with them both. Particularly at this price point. They both look just like their pricier “crystal” competitors. A great buy and bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Belize

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large vase in hopes that it would be larger than the vases we already own. The claimed opening of 5" measures only 4-1/8" at best, and the inside tapers down to 2-1/4" diameter about 4" below the rim. This makes this vase much smaller in terms of usable capacity than I expected. It's a nice looking and sturdy vase, if you don't mind only having a small bouquet in it. It's not worth the hassle to return it, but the stated size was misleading for sure.
customer_reviews.author: J. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Happiness!
customer_reviews.text: Filled with beautiful flowers for my sons girlfriend. I liked the heaviness,overall look of the vase. Very pleased!! She was also happy with the gift!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: glass a little cloudy
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with the crystal, it was a bit cloudy looking. The size was lovely and so is the design I just didn't care for the quality of glass.
customer_reviews.author: nuala

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: It’s heavier then I expected. It’s really pretty will definitely get more of these. I brought it for myself for Mother’s Day
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, Looks Expensive!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for a friend-She Loves It! She has fresh flowers every day! She put away her other vases and only use this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product that I have ever purchased on Amazon. It arrived in a box that was not sealed and had clearly been opened. The product itself looked cloudy, dirty, and undoubtably used. The images are very misleading as the vase itself is very small. Please save yourself the $13. I returned it and was refunded but I am still in shock that a product that with relatively good reviews was so terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Grace

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Vase
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This is a very beautiful thick glass vase. It is heavy and steady. My curious cat loves to study all new bouquets of flowers and I hope that this vase will not fall as easily as the previous ones.
customer_reviews.author: Vale Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Nice vase, I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly nice class Bass. The vase seems to be well made and is quite sturdy. I would recommend the surveys to others.

customer_reviews.title: NIce heavy vase for table center
customer_reviews.text: This is a great flower vase for a center piece on the table. It is thick and sturdy and does not tip easily. Very nice.

customer_reviews.title: Not as tall as shown in the listing.
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed in the height of the vase. At least an inch shorter than what it shows. It is very thick and sturdy and the price is very reasonable.

customer_reviews.title: Tiny tiny Tiny

This lovely little vase is so pretty and is the perfect size and shape for those little bundles of joy. No more cheap dollar store vases for me!

product_meta.title: Slymeay Flower Vases Phoenix Tail Shape Thickened Crystal Glass for Home Decor, Wedding or Gift - 8" High x4 Wide,Clear,with Color Box
feature_bullets: Both all sides and bottom of the vase is thickened design, compared with ordinary vase more thick and strong, with high quality lead-free crystal glass looks like a gentleman, elegant and stable
8-inch height,4-inch the opening width. Crystal glass production, the vase is more glaring than general vase, particularly in reflecting light, the vase will be very bright.
Opening of the vase is the phoenix tail shape, the side is grain design, beyond doubt this is a very artistic vase.
Not only for home decoration, restaurant decoration, flower shop decoration, office decoration, and we believe it is a perfect gift!
No sharp corners, bubbles and wrinkles on the glass, safe and beautiful.Easy to wash and shock resistant
